name: The Fuel Finder
description: Play as a robot sent to collect all the fuel in a weird world after the last attempt failed. A 3D platformer still in development so there are only 2 levels for the time being, but music, more levels, and effects will later be added. Collect all the crystals of a new form of fuel that they sent the robot to collect. to complete a level, collect the fuel canister, but even if you collect it, you will still be able to fine all 50 gems in each level. Have fun and comment suggestions you have to be added.
